pages.text: $(li)It exists three types of Timber Blocks: Frames, Braces and Cross Braces.$(br)$(li)Each of them visually hold any solid block inside. This allows to make every block into a framed one.$(br)$(li)Just right click on a Timber block while you are holding other solid block on your hand.
pages.title: Timbers

pages.text: Insert a picture of a Frame_blocks
